Reviews.Title: “Ok so the truth is...Location Location Location”

Reviews.Content: awesome hotel lovely totally simple pretty clean staff nice breakfast excellentthe tourists neighborhood dutch residents live 15 minute walk definitely value location acacia hotel totally outweighs simplicity cute fun saturday market outside awesome service marble real acacia hotel fine thingthe stairs crazy steep look built 1600s stairs steep home hotel ps

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, very helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: ClarisTexas
Reviews.Content: spent 2 nights hotel acacia recommend stay budget size clean lots light windows nice bathroom comfy bed location hotel fantastic close main train station easy walk anne franks house lots nice restaurants cafes handy bike hire shop highly reccomend mexican resturant outside found staff friendly helpful happy store bag hours checked laptop avail guests access net free plus free printing

Reviews.Title: “Needs more than a lick of paint”

Reviews.Content: lovely location albeit maybe little nice review lonely planet 2008 maybe try instead rest unfortunately rested sunk deep bad location lovely shape hotel quirky steep stairs didnt bother pretty standard holland miserable reception key stairs wasnt nicest welcome hot pretty battered spruce beds stupidly soft sleeping bathroom horrible care breakfast ok nice feel breakfast rest updating oh woke final day realised towels time paid debit card dont accept left amsterdam definitely jordaan hotel acacia summary missed opportunity lots potential maybe run steam lot money elsewhere
